title: No ML Modeling
description: Congraturations on Baylor University and thanks for hosting this exciting competition! I ended up in the bronze medal, but want to share my simple solution, based on starter kernel. My solution is not complicated: It predicts the probability of the occurrence of the upset, which means that the low seed rank team beats the high seed rank team, aggregating past game results
